description:
Bubaichi is not only well-versed in food knowledge, but also has a strong interest in ancient Chinese culture, especially poetry. From the catchy "Fude Guyuancao Songbie" to the popular "Xiangsi", under what circumstances did the poets create masterpieces that have been sung for thousands of years and are still enduring? What are the moving, sad, or romantic stories behind these poems? Bubaichi has since embarked on an adventure to explore the stories behind ancient poems and traditional Chinese culture.
source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

titles.title: Bu Bai Chi Gu Shici Man Youji Di Er Ji
不白吃古诗词漫游记 第二季
